languages.text: "Недавно ты задал{mf||а} мне вопрос, элантах. И я здесь, чтобы преподнести ответ". {n}Ирлиэт плавно выходит из теней капитанского мостика, и свет люменов освещает ее сияющее лицо — чуть более задумчивое, чем обычно.{/n}

"You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Недавно ты задал{mf||а} мне вопрос, элантах. И я здесь, чтобы преподнести ответ". {n}Ирлиэт плавно выходит из теней капитанского мостика, и свет люменов освещает ее сияющее лицо — чуть более задумчивое, чем обычно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}

"You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}

"You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}

"You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}

languages.text: «No hace mucho me hiciste una pregunta, elantach. Ahora acudo a ti con mi respuesta». {n}Yrliet emerge de entre las sombras del puente de mando con una elegancia felina. Su rostro resplandece bajo la luz de los lúmenes; se la ve un poco más pensativa de lo habitual.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No hace mucho me hiciste una pregunta, elantach. Ahora acudo a ti con mi respuesta». {n}Yrliet emerge de entre las sombras del puente de mando con una elegancia felina. Su rostro resplandece bajo la luz de los lúmenes; se la ve un poco más pensativa de lo habitual.{/n}

languages.text: 「エランタ、お前は少し前に我にある質問をした。その答えを伝えたいと思う」{n}流れるような優雅さで、ユリエットがキャプテンブリッジの影から姿を現した。光の下で彼女の顔が輝いているように見える。いつもより少し不安な表情を浮かべているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、お前は少し前に我にある質問をした。その答えを伝えたいと思う」{n}流れるような優雅さで、ユリエットがキャプテンブリッジの影から姿を現した。光の下で彼女の顔が輝いているように見える。いつもより少し不安な表情を浮かべているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: “你不久前问过我一个问题，外界人。现在，我来回答你了。”{n}伊莉耶特从舰桥的阴影中优雅地现出身形。她的面孔在流明灯的照耀下容光焕发，露出了比平时更为沉静的表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你不久前问过我一个问题，外界人。现在，我来回答你了。”{n}伊莉耶特从舰桥的阴影中优雅地现出身形。她的面孔在流明灯的照耀下容光焕发，露出了比平时更为沉静的表情。{/n}

languages.text: « Vous m'avez récemment posé une question, elantach, et je suis venue vous apporter ma réponse. » {n}Avec une grâce fluide, Yrliet émerge des ombres de la passerelle de commandement. Son visage paraît luisant sous la lumière artificielle et son expression est plus pensive qu'à l'accoutumée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez récemment posé une question, elantach, et je suis venue vous apporter ma réponse. » {n}Avec une grâce fluide, Yrliet émerge des ombres de la passerelle de commandement. Son visage paraît luisant sous la lumière artificielle et son expression est plus pensive qu'à l'accoutumée.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt mir vor nicht allzu langer Zeit eine Frage gestellt, Elantach. Und ich bin nun hier, um Euch meine Antwort zu präsentieren." {n}Mit flüssiger Eleganz taucht Yrliet aus den Schatten auf der Brücke auf. Ihr Gesicht scheint unter dem Lumen-Licht zu leuchte, ihr Ausdruck ist nachdenklicher als sonst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mir vor nicht allzu langer Zeit eine Frage gestellt, Elantach. Und ich bin nun hier, um Euch meine Antwort zu präsentieren." {n}Mit flüssiger Eleganz taucht Yrliet aus den Schatten auf der Brücke auf. Ihr Gesicht scheint unter dem Lumen-Licht zu leuchte, ihr Ausdruck ist nachdenklicher als sonst.{/n}

languages.text: "Kısa süre önce bana bir soru sormuştun elantach. Şimdi sorunun cevabını vereceğim." {n}Yrliet, kaptan köprüsünün gölgelerinden tüm zarafetiyle çıkageliyor. Yüzü lümen ışığında parlıyor, ifadeleriyse her zamankinden biraz daha endişeli duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You posed a question to me not long ago, elantach. And now I am here to present you with my answer." {n}With fluid grace, Yrliet emerges from the shadows of the captain's bridge. Her face seems to glow under the lumen light, her expression slightly more pensive than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yakın zaman önce bana bir soru sormuştun elantach. Sorunun cevabını vermek için buradayım." {n}Yrliet, kaptan köprüsünün gölgelerinden tüm zarafetiyle çıkageliyor. Yüzü lümen ışığında parlıyor, ifadeleriyse her zamankinden biraz daha endişeli duruyor.{/n}
